description: Creates a connection that can then be given to other Amazon Web Services services like CodePipeline so that it can access third-party code repositories. The connection is in pending status until the third-party connection handshake is completed from the console.

parameters.name: ConnectionName
parameters.description: The name of the connection to be created.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The key-value pair to use when tagging the resource. (dict) --- A tag is a key-value pair that is used to manage the resource. This tag is available for use by Amazon Web Services services that support tags. The tag's key. The tag's value.

nested_items.name: ConnectionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the connection to be created. The ARN is used as the connection reference when the connection is shared between Amazon Web Services services.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: Specifies the tags applied to the resource.
